00040 #ifndef METACODE_CPP
00041 #define METACODE_CPP
00042 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043 // This will expose all keyboard and mouse, joystick and other userinput events
00044 // to developers, we are using the SDL keymap to get us started, large portions
00045 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too
00046 ///////////////////////////////////////
00047 
00048 
00049 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00050 // Includes
00051 ///////////////////////////////////////
00052 
00053 //#include "physdatatypes.h"
00054 #include "metacode.h"
00055 
00056 #include <assert.h>
00057 #include <ostream>
00058 
00059 #include "SDL.h"
00060 
00061 using namespace std;
00062 
00063 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00064 // MetaCode
00065 ///////////////////////////////////////
00066 MetaCode::MetaCode()
00067 {}
00068 
00069 MetaCode::MetaCode(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00070 {
00071     Construct(MetaValue_, ID_, Code_);
00072 }
00073 
00074 MetaCode::MetaCode(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00075 {
00076     Construct(RawEvent_);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void MetaCode::Construct(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00080 {
00081     //create a safe but gibberish default
00082     Construct(BUTTON_UP, 0, KEY_FIRST);
00083     /// @todo TODO: Actually process each event
00084     switch(RawEvent_.type)
00085     {
00086         case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00087             //    Construct(MetaValue_, ID_, Code_);
00088             Construct(BUTTON_PRESSING, 0, GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(RawEvent_));
00089             break;
00090         case SDL_KEYUP:
00091             Construct(BUTTON_LIFTING, 0, GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(RawEvent_));
00092             break;
00093 
00094         case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:/// @todo TODO determine if Joystick RawEvents will emit 1 or multiple Metacodes
00095             break;
00096         case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00097             break;
00098         case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00099             break;
00100         case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00101             break;
00102         case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00103             break;
00104 
00105         case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00106         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00107         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00108             throw ("RawEvent which creates Multiple Metacodes inserted into Metacode");
00109             break;
00110 
00111         default:
00112             throw ("Unknown User Input Inserted into Metacode");
00113             break;
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 //This function assumes the RawEvent is a valid SDL Keyevent
00118 MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetInputCodeFromSDL_KEY(const RawEvent &RawEvent_)
00119 {
00120     //This Whole thing will only work with SDL events. If we switch out event subsystems this is one of those that must change it.
00121     MetaCode::InputCode To;
00122 
00123     assert( sizeof(To)==sizeof(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym) );
00124     memcpy( &To, &(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym), sizeof(RawEvent_.key.keysym.sym));
00125 
00126     return To;
00127 }
00128 
00129 void MetaCode::Construct(const int &MetaValue_, const short unsigned int &ID_, const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00130 {
00131     SetMetaValue(MetaValue_);
00132     SetID(ID_);
00133     SetCode(Code_);
00134 }
00135 
00136 int MetaCode::GetMetaValue() const
00137 {
00138     return this->MetaValue;
00139 }
00140 
00141 MetaCode::InputCode MetaCode::GetCode() const
00142 {
00143     return this->Code;
00144 }
00145 
00146 short unsigned int MetaCode::GetID() const
00147 {
00148     return this->ID;
00149 }
00150 
00151 void MetaCode::SetMetaValue(const int &MetaValue_)
00152 {
00153     this->MetaValue=MetaValue_;
00154 }
00155 
00156 void MetaCode::SetCode(const MetaCode::InputCode &Code_)
00157 {
00158     this->Code=Code_;
00159 }
00160 
00161 void MetaCode::SetID(const short unsigned int &ID_)
00162 {
00163     this->ID=ID_;
00164 }
00165 
00166 bool MetaCode::operator==(const MetaCode &other) const
00167 {
00168     if(this->Code == other.Code && this->MetaValue == other.MetaValue)
00169     {
00170         return true;
00171     }else{
00172         return false;
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00176 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const MetaCode& x)
00177 {
00178     stream << "( MetaValue:" << x.GetMetaValue()
00179            << ", ID:" << x.GetID()
00180            << ", Code:" << x.GetCode()
00181            <<  " )";
00182     return stream;
00183 }
